subject: Control box for 3rd party pedals
description_text:
Good morning, I hope you had a great holiday. I am just wondering what control box would you recommend for the haptic motors using third-party pedal sets?

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi James Esaw,  Could you please tell me which pedal model you have? We can help evaluate it, and generally, the PlusX control box is recommended.

Hello, I have a set of Logitech G pro pedals that I would like to add some haptics to. :)

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi James Esaw,  There are some 3D-printable connectors available online that can be used to mount our vibration module.            https://www.etsy.com/listing/4379222112/simsonn-vam-and-vam-pro-haptic-pedal?dd_referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F
